tool_description: This tool retrieves detailed information about a specific Pfam entry given its entry accession ID. The information includes the entry name, type, description, and Wikipedia search information.

required_parameters.name: accession_id
required_parameters.description: The accession ID of the Pfam entry to be searched. This ID typically starts with 'PF' followed by five digits, for example, 'PF00001'

return_values.name: query_result
return_values.description: The detailed information of the Pfam entry, including its entry name, entry type, description, and relevant Wikipedia information.
